name: Ingenious Engineering: Pneuma Re-Creation
description:
Before you choose your action: If your side has no more than 4 Elemental Dice remaining, create a Pneuma Block. (Once per Round)
After a Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction occurs on an opponent's character: Generate 3 Omni Element. (When a character is defeated, a Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction will not be triggered)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Before you choose your action:</color> If your side has no more than 4 Elemental Dice remaining, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C403027]</color>. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After a $[K1015] occurs on an opponent's character:</color> Generate 3 $[K411]. (When a character is defeated, a $[K1015] will not be triggered)
